price: 13. Markaasuu Rasuulkii Alle (Nabi Saalix) ku yidhi : Iska daaya Hasha Ilaahay (ha dilana) oo siiya waraabkeeda.
arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: faqāla lahum rasūlu al-lahi nāqata al-lahi wasuq'yāhā
